channel.title: [317] it won't work!
channel.description:
alright.. I know this probably isn't in the right place.. but I CANNOT FIND A PLACE TO PUT THIS TOPIC!!!
ok. I have a good client and server.. they are supposed to go together.. but every time I go to get on it from the client.. it doesn't work.. it always says error connecting to server.. I have done everything in those tutorials on here... and it still doesn't work!
this is in the GUI.java in the client.... [IMG]http://i360.photobucket.com/albums/oo47/perez048/help-me-2-1.png[/img]
this is also in the GUI.java IN THE CLIENT.. [IMG]http://i360.photobucket.com/albums/oo47/perez048/help-me-3-1.png[/img]
and this is in the server crap.. [IMG]http://i360.photobucket.com/albums/oo47/perez048/help-me-1.png[/img]
I can't find anything else that has to do with connecting to eachother.. I've done port forwarding.. no-ip.. ect..

item.title: [317] it won't work!
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

[quote=“Umah, post:9, topic:291406”][quote author=gamerbug link=topic=385103.msg2888448#msg2888448 date=1248749879]

One problem is that you’re supposed to be connecting to 127.0.0.1, also moving to client help

removed pictures too, as they contained an IP, edit it out and you can re-add them.

try typing “localhost” in the i.p, or just leave it blank to connect. I just leave it blank for quick testing.

ok ty, but I did that "127.0.0.1 and even then, it doesn’t do anything! this sucks… I’ve been tryin to get a server up and running forever and it never works!
[/quote][/quote]

which ip though? there are 3 slots that I found…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2009, 02:54:25 pm[/size][hr]which ip though? there are 3 slots that I found…

Read full topic
